ace-constitution-documentation.description: ACE system constitution and coding principles documentation in Markdown format

pattern-confidence-tracking.description: Tracking and displaying confidence metrics for learned coding patterns

ace-playbook-system.description: Structured playbook reference system linking principles to detailed specifications

documentation-generation.description: Auto-generated documentation with metadata and timestamps from learned patterns

confidence-based-learning.description: Machine learning system that tracks confidence levels and adapts based on observation counts

evolutionary-documentation.description: Documentation that evolves automatically based on confidence thresholds and pattern validation

evidence-based-guidelines.description: Establish coding guidelines based on empirical evidence and repeated observations rather than arbitrary rules

confidence-threshold-gating.description: Use confidence thresholds to filter low-quality patterns and promote high-quality ones

living-documentation.description: Documentation should evolve automatically as the codebase changes and patterns are validated

cross-referencing.description: Link related documentation artifacts to enable deep exploration and context navigation

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file paths and descriptions
